name: Operative
long_description:
Operative is a platform for organizations to build internal applications quickly using AI. We provide a web interface where organizations can create new web applications tailored to specific use cases, using their existing backend APIs (supporting existing authentication & authorization). We're like retool but we connect directly with a company's internal APIs and allow users to generate arbitrary frontend code.

We've launched a consumer product that has been well received, and most recently have discovered that businesses & enterprises are interested in code generation for internal applications as well, and we're now focused on this direciton.
one_liner: Web application code generation for internal APIs
